Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class EventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.EventRepository
public class EventRepository extends Object
The EventRepository class provides methods to interact with Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage for event-related operations. It handles uploading images, adding events to the repository, and updating the list of events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventRepository()
    Constructs a new EventRepository and initializes Firestore references.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEventToRepo(Event event, android.net.Uri posterUri, android.net.Uri qrCodeUri)
    Adds an event to the repository by uploading the poster and QR code images, then saving the event data to Firestore.
    void
    updateEvents()
    Updates the list of events by listening to changes in the Firestore 'Events' collection.

    uploadImageToStorage(android.net.Uri imageUri, String path, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<android.net.Uri> onCompleteListener)
    Uploads an image to Firebase Storage at the specified path and triggers a callback upon completion.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventRepository

      public EventRepository()
      Constructs a new EventRepository and initializes Firestore references.

  • Method Details

    • updateEvents

      public void updateEvents()
      Updates the list of events by listening to changes in the Firestore 'Events' collection. The method sets up a snapshot listener that updates the eventsDataList whenever the data changes.

    • uploadImageToStorage

      public void uploadImageToStorage(android.net.Uri imageUri, String path, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<android.net.Uri> onCompleteListener)
      Uploads an image to Firebase Storage at the specified path and triggers a callback upon completion.
      Parameters:
      imageUri - The URI of the image to upload.
      path - The storage path where the image will be uploaded.
      onCompleteListener - The listener to be called upon completion of the upload.

    • addEventToRepo

      public void addEventToRepo(Event event, android.net.Uri posterUri, android.net.Uri qrCodeUri)
      Adds an event to the repository by uploading the poster and QR code images, then saving the event data to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object containing event details.
      posterUri - The URI of the event poster image.
      qrCodeUri - The URI of the event QR code image.
